title: "AI goes underground: root crop growth predicted with drone imagery"
excerpt: "Root crops like cassava, carrots and potatoes are notoriously good at hiding disease or deficiencies which might affect their growth. While leaves may look green and healthy, farmers can face nasty surprises when they go to harvest their crops."
